Uses of Class
org.quartz.ScheduleBuilder

  • Packages that use ScheduleBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.quartz
    The main package of Quartz, containing the client-side interfaces.
    org.quartz.impl.jdbcjobstore  
    org.quartz.impl.triggers
    This package contains Trigger implementations that ship with Quartz.

    • Uses of ScheduleBuilder in org.quartz

      Subclasses of ScheduleBuilder in org.quartz 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CalendarIntervalScheduleBuilder
      CalendarIntervalScheduleBuilder is a ScheduleBuilder that defines calendar time (day, week, month, year) interval-based schedules for Triggers.
      class  CronScheduleBuilder
      CronScheduleBuilder is a ScheduleBuilder that defines CronExpression-based schedules for Triggers.
      class  DailyTimeIntervalScheduleBuilder
      A ScheduleBuilder implementation that build schedule for DailyTimeIntervalTrigger.
      class  SimpleScheduleBuilder
      SimpleScheduleBuilder is a ScheduleBuilder that defines strict/literal interval-based schedules for Triggers.
      Methods in org.quartz that return ScheduleBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScheduleBuilder<? extends Trigger> Trigger.getScheduleBuilder()
      Get a ScheduleBuilder that is configured to produce a schedule identical to this trigger's schedule.
      Methods in org.quartz with parameters of type ScheduleBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <SBT extends T>
      TriggerBuilder<SBT>      		 TriggerBuilder.withSchedule(ScheduleBuilder<SBT> schedBuilder)
      Set the ScheduleBuilder that will be used to define the Trigger's schedule.

      Constructor and Description
      TriggerPropertyBundle(ScheduleBuilder<?> sb, String[] statePropertyNames, Object[] statePropertyValues)

      Get a ScheduleBuilder that is configured to produce a schedule identical to this trigger's schedule.
